chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> f x y <> 0 -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v <> 0) x y

Premises:
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_and : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v /\ Q u v) x y
continuity_2d_pt_filterlim : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y < -> filterlim (fun z : R * R => f (fst z) (snd z)) (locally (x, y)) (locally (f x y))
uniform_continuity_2d : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b c d : R), (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> c <= y <= d -> continuity_2d_pt f x y) -> forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y u v : R, a <= x <= b -> c <= y <= d -> a <= u <= b -> c <= v <= d -> Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps
uniform_continuity_2d_1d' : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b c : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f c x) -> forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y u v : R, a <= x <= b -> c - delta <= y <= c + delta -> a <= u <= b -> c - delta <= v <= c + delta -> Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (f v u - f y x) < eps
uniform_continuity_2d_1d : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b c : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f x c) -> forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y u v : R, a <= x <= b -> c - delta <= y <= c + delta -> a <= u <= b -> c - delta <= v <= c + delta -> Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
locally_2d_1d : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally_2d P (x + t * (u - x)) (y + t * (v - y))) x y
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
continuous_neq_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f x0 -> f x0 <> 0 -> exists eps : posreal, forall h : R, Rabs h < eps -> f (x0 + h) <> 0
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
compactness_value_2d : forall (a b a' b' : R) (delta : R -> R -> posreal), {d : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a' <= y <= b' -> ~ ~ (exists u v : R, a <= u <= b /\ a' <= v <= b' /\ Rabs (x - u) < delta u v /\ Rabs (y - v) < delta u v /\ d <= delta u v)}
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
locally_2d_ex_dec : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall x0 y0 : R, P x0 y0 \/ ~ P x0 y0) -> locally_2d P x y -> {d : posreal | forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < d -> Rabs (v - y) < d -> P u v}
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
AlembertC3_step1 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x : R), x <> 0 -> (forall n : nat, An n <> 0) -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => Rabs (An (S n) / An n)) 0 -> {l : R | Pser An x l}
D_x = fun (D : R -> Prop) (y x : R) => D x /\ y <> x : (R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
sum_f_R0 = fix sum_f_R0 (f : nat -> R) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => f 0%nat | S i => sum_f_R0 f i + f (S i) end : (nat -> R) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]
Alembert_C3 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x : R), (forall n : nat, An n <> 0) -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => Rabs (An (S n) / An n)) 0 -> {l : R | Pser An x l}
continuity_pt = fun (f : R -> R) (x0 : R) => continue_in f no_cond x0 : (R -> R) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
pow_nonzero : forall (x : R) (n : nat), x <> 0 -> x ^ n <> 0
AlembertC3_step2 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x : R), x = 0 -> {l : R | Pser An x l}
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Record Metric_Space : Type := Build_Metric_Space { Base : Type; dist : Base -> Base -> R; dist_pos : forall x y : Base, dist x y >= 0; dist_sym : forall x y : Base, dist x y = dist y x; dist_refl : forall x y : Base, dist x y = 0 < -> x = y; dist_tri : forall x y z : Base, dist x y <= dist x z + dist z y } For Build_Metric_Space: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
RMicromega.RTautoChecker_sound : forall (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula RMicromega.Rcst)) (w : list RMicromega.RWitness), RMicromega.RTautoChecker f w = true -> forall env : RingMicromega.PolEnv R, Tauto.eval_bf (RMicromega.Reval_formula env) f
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
locally_ex_dec : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x0 : ?T, P x0 \/ ~ P x0) -> locally x P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
Alembert_C2 : forall An : nat -> R, (forall n : nat, An n <> 0) -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => Rabs (An (S n) / An n)) 0 -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 An N) l}
Pser = fun (An : nat -> R) (x l : R) => infinite_sum (fun n : nat => An n * x ^ n) l : (nat -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
sign_neq_0 : forall x : R, x <> 0 -> sign x <> 0
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2d ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
tech12 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x l : R), Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => An i * x ^ i) N) l -> Pser An x l
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4

```coq
intros f x y cont_f_neq0 cont_f_loc.
unfold locally_2d. intros eps.
specialize (cont_f_neq0 eps).
intros delta cont_f.
unfold locally_2d in cont_f.
unfold locally_2d.
intros u v H1 H2.
apply cont_f.
apply cont_f_loc.
exact H1.
exact H2.
Qed.```

original: intros f x y cont_f_neq0 cont_f_loc. unfold locally_2d. intros eps. specialize (cont_f_neq0 eps). intros delta cont_f. unfold locally_2d in cont_f. unfold locally_2d. intros u v H1 H2. apply cont_f. apply cont_f_loc. apply H1. apply H2.
